Major_Arcs.title: Introduction of Human Meteor and Initial Conflicts
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces Duke O'Dowd as the Human Meteor and sets up initial conflicts both underwater and on land, establishing his dual identity and hinting at larger threats.

sub_scenes.title: Underwater Origin and Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: Introduction of Human Meteor underwater, encountering divers and establishing his origin story and initial conflict.

sub_scenes.title: Taxi Ride and Growing Suspicion
sub_scenes.description: Duke O'Dowd as a taxi driver picks up suspicious passengers and notices he is being followed, building suspense.

narrative_arcs.title: Taxi Ride to the Waterfront and Suspicion

sub_scenes.title: Transformation and Street Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: Duke transforms into Human Meteor after dropping off passengers and confronts perceived 'cop shooters'.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival at the Pier and Transformation

sub_scenes.title: Aftermath, Hospital and Submarine Plot Reveal
sub_scenes.description: Human Meteor injured but praised by police, followed by a hospital visit revealing a yacht and submarine plot.

narrative_arcs.title: Hospital Revelation of Yacht and Submarine Plot

sub_scenes.title: Planning and Stowaway Mission
sub_scenes.description: Duke plans with police and Toby to investigate the yacht, setting up a stowaway mission.

narrative_arcs.title: Duke's Plan and Toby's Stowaway Mission

sub_scenes.title: Yacht Observation and Depth Chart Discovery
sub_scenes.description: Pete observes suspicious activity on the yacht while Duke, as Toby, discovers a marked depth chart leading to his fall.

narrative_arcs.title: Depth Chart Discovery and Sudden Fall

sub_scenes.title: Namor's Intervention and Underwater Torpedo Plot
sub_scenes.description: Namor arrives to investigate, discovers a sunken submarine with torpedoes, and encounters hostile divers.

narrative_arcs.title: Sunken Submarine Discovery and Underwater Encounter

sub_scenes.title: Underwater Combat and Submarine Escape
sub_scenes.description: Namor fights divers, the submarine attempts to escape, and Namor escalates his attack with a torpedo.

narrative_arcs.title: Subduing a Diver and Submarine's Evasion
Confrontation with the Red Suit Diver and Underwater Struggle
Namor's Surface Attack on the Ship with Torpedo

sub_scenes.title: Yacht Pursuit and Peter's Death Investigation
sub_scenes.description: Namor pursues the yacht, discovers Peter's body, and investigates his cabin, uncovering a conspiracy.

narrative_arcs.title: Discovery of Peter in Diving Helmet
Investigation in Peter's Cabin and Jap Navy Connection
Confirmation of Peter's Double Life and Swift Action
Driving Toby Home After a Long Day
Arriving Home and Mother's Concern for Toby

Major_Arcs.title: Liberty Lads and the Ambulance Mystery
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces the Liberty Lads and their confrontation with Nazi Fiends, followed by an ambulance arrival and a dropped wallet mystery, shifting the narrative to a new set of characters and a street-level investigation.

sub_scenes.title: Liberty Lads Confront Nazi Fiends
sub_scenes.description: Liberty Lads confront Nazi Fiends with guns, setting up a conflict scenario.

sub_scenes.title: Ambulance Arrival and Injured Person
sub_scenes.description: Boys observe an ambulance arriving at a house and an injured person being taken away, sparking curiosity.

sub_scenes.title: The Dropped Wallet and Garage Clue
sub_scenes.description: Boys find a dropped wallet with a garage address, leading them to a new location.

narrative_arcs.title: The Dropped Wallet and Garage Clue
Marine Salute and Major Bronson's Civilian Clothes

Major_Arcs.title: Boys' Capture and Rescue by Major Bronson
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on the boys' investigation at the garage, their capture by Mr. Horst, and their dramatic rescue by Major Bronson from a deadly plot.

sub_scenes.title: Wallet Retrieval and Journey to Mr. Horst
sub_scenes.description: Boys attempt to retrieve the wallet, get intercepted by police, and are taken to Mr. Horst.

sub_scenes.title: Interrogation and Carbon Monoxide Plot
sub_scenes.description: Mr. Horst interrogates the boys about the wallet while his men plan to eliminate them using carbon monoxide.

sub_scenes.title: Bronson's Violent Rescue and Aftermath
sub_scenes.description: Major Bronson intervenes violently, rescuing the boys from Mr. Horst and his men in a chaotic confrontation.

narrative_arcs.title: Boys Head to Waterfront for Help
The Marines Engage in a Scrap
Urgent Medical Aid for the Major

Major_Arcs.title: The Champ in South America: Rosita's Kidnapping
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces 'The Champ' and his friend Henry in South America, investigating the kidnapping of the President's daughter, Rosita, by El Tigre and his Axis-linked plot.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction of The Champ and South American Setting
sub_scenes.description: Introduction of 'The Champ' and Henry and setting up the South American location and their mission.

narrative_arcs.title: Introduction of The Champ and Setting the Scene
Arrival in a Sleepy South American Town

sub_scenes.title: Interrogation and Kidnapping Revelation
sub_scenes.description: Champ is interrogated by officers, leading to confusion and then the revelation of Rosita's kidnapping by El Tigre.

sub_scenes.title: Forced Journey and Rescue Misunderstanding
sub_scenes.description: Men are forced into a car and taken to a house where a woman mistakes them for rescuers of Rosita.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival and Revelation at the House

sub_scenes.title: Stealthy Infiltration and Confrontation with El Tigre
sub_scenes.description: Another group plans and executes a stealthy infiltration of El Tigre's hideout, culminating in a confrontation.

Major_Arcs.title: Rosita's Rescue and Victory in South America
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc concludes the South American adventure with the rescue of Rosita, a chaotic fight, and recognition of 'The Champ's heroism.

sub_scenes.title: Humiliation, Search for Rosita and Explanation
sub_scenes.description: Humiliation of a henchman, desperate search for Rosita, and El Tigre's explanation about Axis agents.

sub_scenes.title: Internal Dispute and Urgent Rescue Mission
sub_scenes.description: Internal dispute about El Tigre, followed by urgent news about Rosita's location and a rescue mission.

sub_scenes.title: Hotel Infiltration and Rescue Operation
sub_scenes.description: Pursuit of Axis forces, hotel infiltration, finding Rosita, and facing an ambush.

narrative_arcs.title: Pursuit and Initial Attack on Axis Forces
Seeking Refuge and Planning Entry via Rear
Machine Gun Deployment and Presidential Orders
Gratitude for Life-Saving Bravery and Recognition
Arrival of Government Troops and Search for Rosita

sub_scenes.title: Victory and Farewell
sub_scenes.description: Resolution with gratitude, recognition, and the end of the South American adventure.

narrative_arcs.title: Gratitude for Life-Saving Bravery and Recognition
Arrival of Government Troops and Search for Rosita

Major_Arcs.title: Devil Dog Dolan's Jungle Mission and Betrayal
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces Devil Dog Dolan in a jungle setting, dealing with spies, compromised plans, and native tribes, leading to betrayal and capture.

sub_scenes.title: Jungle Combat and Grave Report
sub_scenes.description: Devil Dog Dolan fights spies in the jungle and receives a grave report about disobedience and compromised plans.

narrative_arcs.title: Grave Report and Canal Zone Discussion
Dolan's Displeasure and Sub Detector Plans

sub_scenes.title: Jungle Tracking and Native Attack
sub_scenes.description: Dolan tracks through the jungle, evades a dart attack, and is ambushed by native warriors.

sub_scenes.title: Capture, Interrogation and Betrayal
sub_scenes.description: Captured men are interrogated and threatened, leading to betrayal and Dolan witnessing the handover of plans.

narrative_arcs.title: Fatherland's Demand and Hot Iron Threat

sub_scenes.title: Fiery Diversion and Jungle Alliance
sub_scenes.description: Dolan expresses regret, a fiery diversion is set, leading to a jungle brawl and unexpected alliance with natives.

sub_scenes.title: Shipboard Surrender, Brawl and Spanking
sub_scenes.description: Ship captain's surrender decision, surprise encounter leading to a brawl, and Dolan's disciplinary spanking.

Major_Arcs.title: Twinkle Twins and the Banker Murder Mystery
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces the Twinkle Twins, Dan and Diane Weston, and their investigation into the murder of banker Robert Burgess, uncovering a racketeering plot and a desperate act of sacrifice.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction of Twinkle Twins and Newspaper Assignment
sub_scenes.description: Introduction of the Twinkle Twins and their assignment to investigate the banker murder case.

narrative_arcs.title: Introduction of the Twinkle Twins Story

sub_scenes.title: Following Leads: Sailor, Police and Hospital
sub_scenes.description: Dan and Diane gather information from a sailor, police, and visit a hospital, uncovering new leads about the suspect and his sick child.

narrative_arcs.title: Information from Sailor and Headquarters Decision
Police Station Inquiry and Hospital Lead
Press Passes and Revelation of Sick Child

sub_scenes.title: Racketeering Suspicions and Blood Transfusion Clue
sub_scenes.description: Suspicions about Barnacci's racketeering arise, and the critical information about Farnacci's compatible blood type is revealed.

narrative_arcs.title: Candy Store Phone Call and New Lead
Arrival in the Irish Section and Pursuit of Reilly

sub_scenes.title: Irish Section Inquiry and Mrs. Murphy's Revelation
sub_scenes.description: Dan and Diane inquire in the Irish section and learn from Mrs. Murphy about Reilly's innocence and sacrifice.

narrative_arcs.title: Seeking Information in the Irish Section

sub_scenes.title: Cab Chase, Roadblock and Street Brawl
sub_scenes.description: A cab chase ensues, leading to a roadblock and a street brawl as tensions escalate.

narrative_arcs.title: Confrontation and De-escalation at the Roadblock

sub_scenes.title: Medical Emergency and Community Blood Drive
sub_scenes.description: Medical emergency response for injured, leading to a community blood drive to save Tom Reilly.

narrative_arcs.title: Emergency Medical Response and Hospital Wait
Blood Transfusion Need and Community Blood Drive
Blood Type Matching and Transfusion Preparation
Blood Transfusion in Progress and Doctor's Reassurance
Demand for Farnacci's Blood and Police Plan
Police Raid and Arrest of Farnacci
Birthday Celebration for Reilly's Daughter's Recovery
